definition.datasource:
from nxstools.pyeval import limaccd ds.result = limaccd.postrun(commonblock, ds.$(name)_saving_next_number, ds.$(name)_saving_directory, ds.$(name)_saving_suffix, ds.$(name)_acq_nb_frames, ds.$(name)_saving_index_format, ds.$(name)_saving_prefix, "$(name)_saving_next_number")
